meanings.sent1: She always puts others before herself.
meanings.sent2: He needs to take care of himself first.
meanings.sent3: The mirror reflected her true self back at her.
meanings.sent4: His self-confidence shone through in his presentation.
meanings.sent5: Knowing oneself is the key to happiness.

meanings.sent1: The doors closed automatically behind him.
meanings.sent2: The machine was set to run automatically every hour.
meanings.sent3: The automatic response to danger kicked in without him realizing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an automatic reaction to his jokes.
meanings.sent5: The system worked like a well-oiled automatic machine.

meanings.sent1: He drove his auto to work every day.
meanings.sent2: The auto broke down on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The auto's horn honked loudly in the traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: Her dream car was a sleek red auto.
meanings.sent5: The auto's engine roared to life as he turned the key.
